item.title: Braindump
item.description: Hello, I’m Samuel Matias , and you’ve stumbled upon my braindump/blog/digital garden. This website contains my articles, notes, food recipes, summing up, everything I think is worth to be sharing. I will be trying to share the content in English 🇺🇸 and Portuguese 🇧🇷. You can start checking out the index with everything I wrote so far. Have fun!

item.title: 🇧🇷 Inicie seu emacs como um serviço na incialização do macOS
item.description: ⭐ Featured post ⭐ Para ler esse conteúdo em inglês, clique aqui . Se você deseja iniciar seus emacs como um serviço na incialização do macOS, você precisa ter instalado o Emacs plus , e depois de instalado, execute este comando: brew services start d12frosted/emacs-plus/emacs-plus

item.title: 🇺🇸 Start your Emacs as a service on macOS startup
item.description: ⭐ Featured post ⭐ To read this content in portuguese, click here . If you want to start your Emacs as a service on the macOS startup, you need to have installed the Emacs plus , and after you have installed, execute this command:. brew services start d12frosted/emacs-plus/emacs-plus
